articles.content:
Spring comes earlier 
     Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Spring has come earlier than usual here in Pyongyang when the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung is just around the corner.
 Beautiful flowers are coming into bloom as if to delight the Korean people and herald the future of prospering Korea.
